items.title: U.S. stock futures fall ahead of big week for tech earnings
items.description: After an encouraging week for Wall Street, U.S. stock futures fell late Sunday, ahead of a busy slate of quarterly earnings over the coming days.

items.title: If a financial adviser wants to roll over your retirement savings, watch out
items.description: Follow your money: Older investors especially might end up in worse financial shape after a rollover.

items.title: What Trump’s next 100 days will mean for taxes, markets and your wallet
items.description: Republicans are hard at work on a complex tax package that will have far-reaching effects for American consumers.

items.title: More tech heavyweights set to report earnings after Alphabet offers some hope amid tariff fears
items.description: Earnings Watch: The earnings week ahead is enormous, and the fretting isn’t over yet.

items.title: ‘She’s kept him afloat’: I’m 78 and leaving my daughter, 41, my life savings, but her partner is a mooch. How can I protect her?
items.description: “He keeps losing jobs and going on unemployment.”
